Unnamed: 1: The attached data contains the baseline (year) information of our cocoa farmers residing in the Blolequin and San Pedro district of Ivory Coast
The attached file contains the below-mentioned data points:
Basic details: Farmer Name, farmer code, village name, gender, education level, total farm area, farm production, average cocoa price.
Recommendation given to the farmer for his plot along with the variables (adoption observations) that needs to be improved.

There are 14 different variables on which the farmers 1. Result (observation of current practice) and Competence (Ability to implement improved practiced) are judged; in case they are repeated in database it means there was a survey at different moments; for which the first entries are baseline and later entries are follow-up visits
Interpretation of the practiced are: Good (G), Medium (M), Bad (B)
